response.overview: Vanessa Del Rio is hot, sizzling hot! She melts the screen. In all of her scenes, she seems to have an unbridled passion with the other actors. Her huge tits were one of her most memorable characteristics. She was also known for being an incredibly sexual person. She always took her scenes to the next level. She was very kinky and loved dirty sex, like her rough locker room scene with Jamie Gillis from Midnight Desires, and her hot anal scene with Paul Thomas from A Scent of Heather. Vanessa also conquers the world of acting with ease - she is actually quite funny, as well as a sex goddess. Latin Heat, starring Vanessa Del Rio, explores this Latin queen of kink and is a must have for any serious collector of rare, vintage material!
response.title: Latin Heat
